mapper.sql: a.ID AS "id", a.Ori_ID AS "oriId", a.Ori_Table AS "oriTable", a.Title as "title", a.Title_Src as "titleSrc", a.Author as "author", a.News_Section as "newsSection", a.Text_Src as "textSrc", a.Category1 as "category1", a.Category2 as "category2", a.Web_Name as "webName", a.Country_ZH as "countryZH", a.Country_EN as "countryEN", a.Language as "language", a.ProgramID as "programID", a.TaskID as "taskID", a.ColumnURL as "columnURL", a.Insert as "insert"
